name: Paubox, Inc.
description: Developer of an e-mail encryption software designed to provide secure email for modern healthcare. The company's cloud-based platform allows businesses to send encrypted e-mails and store, share files and compose and send email as normal, from any device, enabling clients to send and receive information securely.
one_liner: Developer of an e-mail encryption software designed to provide secure email for modern healthcare. The company's cloud-based platform allows businesses to send encrypted e-mails and store, share files and compose and send email as normal, from any device, enabling clients to send and receive information securely.
